description.lang: heatapp! repeaterS2 is a USB powered Z-Wave repeater and part of the heatapp! system. It is used to enhance the network range of the Z-Wave system by repeating the data from other devices in the network wirelessly to the destination device. Wireless transmission takes place via the Z-wave protocol.The device is wall-mounted. A detailed description of the heatapp! system is available in the operating instructions at www.heatapp.deThis product can be operated in any Z-Wave network with other Z-Wave certified devices from other manufacturers. All non-battery operated nodes within the network will act as repeaters regardless of vendor to increase reliability of the network.
